FinancialDataLayer.DataCollection package

Submodules

FinancialDataLayer.DataCollection.CustomDatasetImporter module

class FinancialDataLayer.DataCollection.CustomDatasetImporter.CustomDatasetImporter(path='', df=None)

Bases: DatasetCollector

Main class that provides methods for collecting data.

Attributes

df: pd.DataFrame

dataframe to be loaded

path: str

path of the file to be loaded.

collect()

main function that calls methods for collecting data.

collect()

Calls the data collection methods according to the given parameter. If dataframe is provided then the function that loads data from the dataframe is called, and if the path is provided the function that loads the data frame from a file is called.

Returns

loaded data

Return type

pd.DataFrame

FinancialDataLayer.DataCollection.DataDownloader module

class FinancialDataLayer.DataCollection.DataDownloader.DataDownloader(start_date: str, end_date: str, ticker_list: list, proxy=None)

Bases: DatasetCollector

Provides methods for retrieving daily security data from Yahoo Finance API

Attributes

start_date: str

date that the data starts from

end_datestr

date that the data ends

ticker_list: List

tickers to be downloaded

proxy: str

make each request with a proxy

collect()

calls the funciton that collects data from Yahoo Finance API.

download_from_yahoo()

downloads data from Yahoo Finance API.

collect()

Calls the funciton that collects data from Yahoo Finance API

Returns

downloaded data

Return type

pd.DataFrame

download_from_yahoo() → DataFrame

Downloads data from Yahoo Finance API

Returns

Data that has been downloaded from Yahoo Finance API
columns:

”date” : date “open” : the price when the market is opened. “high” : highest price at which a stock is traded during a period “low” : lowest price of the period “close” : the price when the market is closed. “adjclose” : adjusted close price “volume” : the number of shares traded “tic” : tickers

Return type

pd.DataFrame

static load_from_df(df_to_load) → DataFrame

Loads data from pd.DataFrame

Parameters

Returns

static load_from_file(path) → DataFrame

Loads data from a given file path.

Parameters

path (string) – path of the file to be loaded.

Raises

  • ValueError – Raised when the path contains a file type besides .csv , .xlsx and .json.

  • FileNotFound – Raised when the file to be loaded does not found.

Returns

loaded data.

Return type

pd.DataFrame
